title: The Terror of the Void, a VU for thee.
body:
So Cho'Gath is one of the oldest champions in the game right now, being part of the original 40 champions, and while he looked pretty good back then, I feel this Voidborn atrocity could be shown some love visually, and go from the strangely charming, almost cartoonish malebogia model we have now to something disgusting, something terrifying, something awesome.
I'd love to see my favorite true damage super tank get the visual update he deserves, A Cho'Gath with fangs dripping with blood and the anticipation of future feasts to gorge on.
What do you guys think?

replies.body: He needs more like a texture update only, but yeah.
What he said. Choggi's design is solid (Violator meets Alien) and he's very iconic in the LoL fandom.

I don't know, His model seems kind of weird compared to someone like Kha'zix and kog'maw.
I'm not saying he needs to look completely different, I feel the Spawn look suits him quite nicely, I just thing some of his proportions could be evened out and his voice could get updated, make him look scary, instead of just a bloated lego creature.
his battlecast skin makes him pretty scary..... if you want to pay for it

I think he doesn't need a full blown VU, perhaps a Texture update, and new walking/running animations.
http://www.lolking.net/models/?champion=31&skin=0

I'd suggest a more linear palette( too many shades in the forehead), some more texture on the torso area, and a better polish on his claws.

EDIT: Also, he waves a little too much when idling/walking.
His walk should be a little more straight forward, raptor style, waving a little left and right but with all ...uhm...claw-thingies pointing forward.
That's actually one of my biggest issues with him, he sways a TON in all of his animations for no particular reason, it looks goofy.
Yup, the terror of the void moves like an happy teletubby during recess.
Oh no! Guys, what would be Cho'Gath without his ironical visage? Just think of this "Oh nom nom". The real terror can afford to be kind of funny.

Cho would be a difficult sell for a VU. I think he could use a texture update and maybe some new animations/particles. He is just so iconic even if he is cartoony that's kind of his thing. He's a big monster that reminds of games of the past. I wouldn't want to see him changed and updated to be a sleek Aliens type monster. Leave him big and chunky but he could definitely use new particles and animations including spell, movement/attack that work better with his increasing size.

I'm fairly certain that Cho is based off of a [Carnafex](http://www.games-workshop.com/MEDIA_CustomProductCatalog/m3700235a_99120106031_TyranidCarnifexBrood02_873x627.jpg) from Warhammer 40k, so I doubt they'd reduce his thickness.
he could use some love, especially with his Voice, it sounds really really dates, he kinda reminds me of something you would blow up in Duke Nukem
